messages.title: FAVOURED AREAS SCANDAL: Labour push S17 to the back of the queue for road repairs
messages.content: Local residents are furious that yet again this area has been put to the bottom of the queue by the Labour Party.

messages.title: Keeping in touch with our area
messages.content: Nick Clegg has secured £2.5bn Government cash to get Sheffield's children off to the best start.

messages.title: Former Conservative candidate backs Nick Clegg
messages.content: If you want an MP who, country before party, has the courage of his convictions and puts Sheffield first, you should back Nick.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secured £2.5bn Government cash to help Sheffield's children.
Addressing the issue of favouritism in road repairs in the constituency.

leaflet.personalStatement: Former Conservative candidate endorses Nick Clegg, stating his courage of convictions and putting Sheffield first.

endorsements.endorsement: If you want an MP who, country before party, has the courage of his convictions and puts Sheffield first, you should back Nick.

quotes.text: Local residents are furious that yet again this area has been put to the bottom of the queue by the Labour Party.

images.caption: Nick Clegg and supporters discussing local issues.
